title: We need a better system in-game...

replies.body: You care way too much about it, unless you just don't win a lot. Just move on to the next game mentally before that game is even over.

Its not the lp loss I care about, its the matchmaking. I don't really care if they dont give me my LP, I want a better matchmaking because I want to play with players who where chill with playing. Kind of like karma, if you do good you get to play with good players (not in skills but in attitudes).

It's almost impossible to keep trolls from trolling, unfortunately. The only thing they might do is evaluate trolling reports in ranked differently, with punishments including set duration bans on ranked play. IE "You must play 10 normal games before you play ranked again." That'd probably just mean more trolling in normals, though, so it's not a perfect fix. "10 AI games" maybe?
But no, its very unlikely riot will add anything to help with the l.p. loss.
